00028 #include "dbprim.h"
00029 #include "dbprim_int.h"
00030 
00031 RCSTAG("@(#)$Id: ht__add_8c-source.html,v 1.3 2006/09/04 15:12:16 spale Exp $");
00032 
00033 unsigned long
00034 ht_add(hash_table_t *table, hash_entry_t *entry, db_key_t *key)
00035 {
00036   unsigned long retval;
00037 
00038   initialize_dbpr_error_table(); /* initialize error table */
00039 
00040   if (!ht_verify(table) || !he_verify(entry) || !key) /* verify arguments */
00041     return DB_ERR_BADARGS;
00042 
00043   if (entry->he_table) /* it's already in a table... */
00044     return DB_ERR_BUSY;
00045 
00046   if (table->ht_flags & HASH_FLAG_FREEZE) /* don't add to frozen tables */
00047     return DB_ERR_FROZEN;
00048 
00049   if (!table->ht_table && !(table->ht_flags & HASH_FLAG_AUTOGROW))
00050     return DB_ERR_NOTABLE;
00051 
00052   /* It looks like we could optimize here, but don't be deceived--the table
00053    * may grow between here and when we fill in the entry's hash value, and
00054    * that would change the hash value.
00055    */
00056   if (!ht_find(table, 0, key)) /* don't permit duplicates */
00057     return DB_ERR_DUPLICATE;
00058 
00059   /* grow the table if necessary and allowed */
00060   if ((table->ht_count + 1) > table->ht_rollover &&
00061       (table->ht_flags & HASH_FLAG_AUTOGROW) &&
00062       (retval = ht_resize(table, _hash_fuzz(table->ht_count + 1))))
00063     return retval;
00064 
00065   /* Force the link element to point to the entry */
00066   le_object(&entry->he_elem) = entry;
00067 
00068   /* copy key value into the hash entry */
00069   entry->he_key = *key; /* thank goodness for structure copy! */
00070 
00071   /* get the hash value for the entry */
00072   entry->he_hash =
00073     (*table->ht_func)(table, &entry->he_key) % table->ht_modulus;
00074 
00075   /* Now add the entry to the table... */
00076   if ((retval = ll_add(&table->ht_table[entry->he_hash], &entry->he_elem,
00077                        LINK_LOC_HEAD, 0)))
00078     return retval;
00079 
00080   table->ht_count++; /* OK, now increment element count */
00081 
00082   entry->he_table = table; /* point entry at table */
00083 
00084   return 0;
00085 }
